name: Hell Runner
description:
Hell Runner is a fast Paced first person platformer game where you try to beat each level as fast as possible. Current early access have 2 chapter and 18 level to play and more is on the way.

Go through eight chapters to deliver the necklace to its rightful owner. Go through each level and try to beat it fast as you can.

Chapters

Eight chapters: Hell, Underground, Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter, Sky, Heaven. Each Chapter gonna have nine levels for you to beat.

TRAIN YOURSELF


Try to achieve the faster time possible for each level and beat others for the top ten Highscore.

.
